title: Services
subtitle: I create web, desktop, mobile applications and mock-ups. Maybe you will be interest in something.

boxes.title: Web Development
boxes.description: I create web applications, including websites with the latest technologies, so they are very fast, efficient and prepared at the highest level. I also prepare them for SEO.

boxes.title: Desktop Development
boxes.description: I create hybrid desktop applications using Electron and WebView technologies. The most important thing I focus on is safety and optimization.

boxes.title: Mobile Development
boxes.description: I create hybrid mobile applications directly in React Native or using WebView. The most important thing I focus on is safety and optimization.

boxes.title: UX/UI Design
boxes.description: I design mock-ups for web applications and websites. They are intuitive, modern, and very precise.
